title: mediaplayerelement seekbar hover thumbnail
body: This feature is almost available in any web based video player or any Desktop based video player, the feature is simple. When a mediaplayerelement is playing or paused a video. and the user hover overs the seekbar, with mouse, or pen or any other input device for that perspective, wherver is the user mouse, show a small thumbnail of the video file at that specific position, just above the seekbar ( slider ) and as the user moves the mouse along the seekbar, the thumbnail should update accordingly.
